article.description: Yunus Hopkinson scored a career-high 25 points to lead St. Francis Brooklyn to a 93-67 win over Division III's Mount St. Vincent on Tuesday night.
article.headline: St. Francis Brooklyn rolls over Mount St. Vincent 93-67
article.linkText: St. Francis Brooklyn rolls over Mount St. Vincent 93-67
article.story: NEW YORK -- Yunus Hopkinson scored a career-high 25 points to lead St. Francis Brooklyn to a 93-67 win over Division III's Mount St. Vincent on Tuesday night. Hopkinson was close to perfect, making 5 of 8 from beyond the arc for 6 of 9 field goals and 8 of 10 free throws for St. Francis (1-1). Glenn Sanabria, who made 3 of 5 from long range and had three steals, finished with 14 points and Jon Doss chipped in 13 and grabbed nine rebounds. St. Francis jumped out to a 45-27 halftime advantage and then coasted to the win shooting 56 percent from the floor in the second half. The Terriers finished with 30 of 60 shooting for the game while limiting Mount St. Vincent to 39.1 percent (25-64). Jamir Ferebee made 9 of 15 field goal attempts to lead Mount St. Vincent with 24 points. Ammad Alkhulaidi added 10

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
